stp_details.scheme_name: TAURUS INFRASTRUCTURE FUND - DIRECT PLAN GROWTH

meta_title: Taurus Infrastructure Fund Direct Growth - Groww
meta_desc: Taurus Infrastructure Fund Direct Growth is Sectoral Equity mutual fund with risk-reward rating of 2/10. It has track record of 11 years, with three year return of 23.27. Risk is Very High
exit_load: Exit load of 1%, if redeemed within 365 days.
description: The scheme would invest in companies belonging to the infrastructure sector, it's related industries inclusive of suppliers of capital goods, raw materials and other supportive services to the infrastructure companies.

analysis.analysis_desc: Consistently lower annualised returns than category average for the past 1Y, 3Y, 5Y and 10Y

amc_info.name: Taurus Mutual Fund
amc_info.address: 3rd Floor, 301-304, ChandravillasCo-op Premises Society Ltd.AML Centre 2, 8 Mahal Industrial Estate,Off. Mahakali CavesRoad, Andheri-East, Mumbai 400093
amc_info.description: Taurus Mutual Fund started their mutual fund on 20/08/1993 and its managing total assets of â‚¹575 Cr. Its ranked at 36 as per total assets at end of 30th Sep 2016.
amc_info.more_description:
Taurus Mutual Fund is one of the first mutual funds to be registered with the Security Exchange Board of India or SEBI. It was registered with SEBI on Sept 21st, 1993 under the Mutual Fund Registration Code. This was one of the first fund houses to launch fully repatriable investments by NRIs/FIIs and since then it has received investments from across the globe.

The AMC has an extremely strong investment policy. They believe that most people invest for creating wealth and they also need trusted financial partners who will take the right decisions on behalf of them. They believe in catering to both categories of investors and they provide them with an array of mutual funds ranging across different categories and market capitalization.

The basically aim for long-term growth, as well as short-term monetary gain.

category_info.category_helper_text: Invests in stocks as per Contrarian investment strategy
category_info.tax_impact: If you redeem within one year, returns are taxed at 20%. If you redeem after one year, returns exceeding Rs 1.25 lakh in a financial year are taxed at 12.5%.
category_info.description: Contra funds follow Contrarian strategy which means investing in stocks in contrast to the prevailing sentiment. Minimum investment in equity is 65%.

fund_manager_details.education: Mr. Kapil has done PGDBM and MBA
fund_manager_details.experience: Prior to joining Taurus Mutual Fund, he has worked with Religare Securities Ltd. and FCH Centrum Wealth Managers Ltd..
